Package ch.ethz.inf.asl13.user40.middleware

Contains the server (middleware) components of the messaging system.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseServicePreparedStatement
    Abstracts away the Postgresql database.
    DatabaseServicePreparedStatement.IntArrayQuery
    A database query that interprets the result as int array by reading the first field of each row in the results.
    DatabaseServicePreparedStatement.MessageQuery
    A database query that returns a Message.
    DatabaseServicePreparedStatement.QueryHolder<T>
    Represents a database query and the methods to set its parameters and to read the resulting data set.
    DatabaseServicePreparedStatement.StatementHolder
    Represents a database statement that returns no result; along with its parameters.
    MemoryMessagingService
    A basic, in-memory implementation of MessagingService.
    MessagingServiceImpl
    The main endpoint is basically a decorator for the true service.
    Server
    Implements the messaging service.

Package ch.ethz.inf.asl13.user40.middleware Description

Contains the server (middleware) components of the messaging system.
Author:
Thomas Gerstendoerfer, Gaurav Jain
